DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine how vitamin D supplementation (ergocalciferol) affects the immune response to mycobacterial infection.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Vitamin D Supplementation on Antimycobacterial Immunity
DOC.criteria: Adult Tuberculosis (TB) contact or TB patient Pregnancy Breastfeeding Hyperparathyroidism Sarcoidosis Renal failure HIV infection
